name: Spoooooky
description:
PLOT

A bunch of mortal miscreants have invaded your humble abode after hearing rumours of monsters existing...

Of course, they were correct, but as the monstrous residents simply wishing to live in peace, you have to invoke your mysterious powers to scare these invaders away!

FEATURES
  • Four playable monsters, each with their own abilities and play styles
  • Lots of things to knock over
  • Partial controller support (in-game only)
  • Local high score saving
  • Baby mode???
CONTROLS

Keyboard

Controller

Use the various abilities of the four unique playable monsters to your advantage, find your play-style and try to get the highest score you can!
